text_block_list.text:
The summer intensive training begins today. In preparation for 
this, I created two training regimens for Admire Vega.

Simply put, one menu can be done alone 
while the other must be done in tandem with me.

I told her she was free to choose either and showed 
her both of the regimens. I expected an immediate 
reply, but she seemed hesitant to answer.
Give me… some time to think.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: After saying that she headed into the cabin.
These regimens… she really put a lot of thought into both of them.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text:
<i>She's also added training to help 
me improve my movement fundamentals.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: This training is suited specifically for my running style. Made specifically for me.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: I know she said she didn't care which one I chose… But I can tell just by looking at these that what I need is… to cooperate with her.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: But…
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: Trainer-san. Regarding the… training regimen.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: I… want…
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: I… want to…
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text:
Admire Vega was searching for the right words. She had already 
made her decision, but was unsure of the right way to say it.

But a feeling of care and 
consideration could be felt around her…
Eh?
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: Trainer-san…
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: You're right… Thank you.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text:
Admire Vega chose to go with the 
regimen that she could do on her own.

As she conducted her training I continued to watch 
over her and continued to support her as her trainer.

Then night fell. I sat alone, looking up at the Summer Triangle 
with the picture book that Admire Vega had recommended me in hand.
choice_data_list: <size=41>Vega, Deneb… and what's the last one?</size>

text_block_list.text:
I shuffled through the pages of 
the book looking for the answer, when…

Altair, it's the first magnitude 
star in the Aquila constellation.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: Admire Vega happened to be there.
choice_data_list: Did you come to stargaze too?

text_block_list.text: Yes…
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: Trainer-san…
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text:
Today's training… was very easy to do. I felt like as I pushed 
forward… I was actually accomplishing something.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: Y-Yes… But.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: The harder you work for my sake… the more my heart hurts.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text:
Your expectations, your effort. If they're real… 
if they're real, I don't deserve it, my sister…
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: Even though she… Even though I…
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
choice_data_list: <size=40>You think only your sister deserves this?</size>
<size=40>You think only your sister deserves this?</size>

text_block_list.text: Eh…?
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: I don't know much about her little sister.

But what I do know is that the thought of 
her sister is causing her immeasurable pain. That's why…
choice_data_list: If you're truly running for her sake…
If you're truly running for her sake…

text_block_list.text:
Neither the training regimen nor my past 
advice was meant solely for Admire Vega.
choice_data_list: <size=41>Everything I did was for the both of you.</size>
<size=41>Everything I did was for the both of you.</size>

text_block_list.text: For… us…?
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: For me… and for… her…
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: Ahh, I think I finally understand.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: That time I went home without looking up at the stars…
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: And that time you called out to me at the planetarium…
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: You didn't do all of that for 'me'… You did it for 'us', didn't you.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text:
Admire Vega sat next to me and looked 
up at the dazzlingly beautiful night sky…
I guess I can teach you a little bit about the stars…
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text:
She then softly explained the glittering 
objects present billions of light years away.
